extracted_playbook.title: Patch and Update Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Install updates/patch operating systems, software, and firmware as soon as updates/patches are released. Immediately patch software affected by vulnerabilities identified in this advisory: CVE-2021-34473, CVE-2018-13379, CVE-2020-12812, and CVE-2019-5591.

extracted_playbook.title: Evaluate and Update Blocklists and Allowlists
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly evaluate and update blocklists and allowlists. If FortiOS is not used by your organization, add the key artifact files used by FortiOS to your organization’s execution blocklist. Prevent any attempts to install or run this program and its associated files.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement and Enforce Backup and Restoration Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly back up data, air gap, and password protect backup copies offline. Ensure copies of critical data are not accessible for modification or deletion from the system where the data resides. Implement a recovery plan to maintain and retain multiple copies of sensitive or proprietary data and servers in a physically separate, segmented, secure location.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Segmentation
extracted_playbook.description: Implement network segmentation to restrict adversary’s lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure User Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Audit user accounts with administrative privileges and configure access controls under the principles of least privilege and separation of duties. Require administrator credentials to install software.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Use multifactor authentication where possible, particularly for webmail, virtual private networks (VPNs), and accounts that access critical systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Strong Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Require all accounts with password logins to have strong, unique passwords.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure and Monitor RDP and Other Potentially Risky Services
extracted_playbook.description: If you use RDP, restrict it to limit access to resources over internal networks. Disable unused remote access/RDP ports. Monitor remote access/RDP logs.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Antivirus Programs
extracted_playbook.description: Install and regularly update antivirus and anti-malware software on all hosts.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: Only use secure networks and avoid using public Wi-Fi networks. Consider installing and using a VPN for remote access.

extracted_playbook.title: Reduce Risk of Phishing
extracted_playbook.description: Consider adding an email banner to emails received from outside your organization. Disable hyperlinks in received emails.
